text: Phyllidia flava is a species of sea slug, a dorid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Phyllidiidae.Gofas, S. (2004). Phyllidia flava Aradas, 1847. In: MolluscaBase (2016). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species on 2016-10-28. ==Distribution== This species is the only Phyllidiid known to be native to the Mediterranean Sea.Rudman, W.B., 1999 (January 12) Phyllidia flava Aradas, 1847. [In] Sea Slug Forum. Australian Museum, Sydney. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Phyllidiidae Category:Gastropods described in 1847
title: Phyllidia flava
